grade: Jōyō kanji, taught in junior high
on reading compounds: 挫折【ザセツ】setback, failure (e.g. plans, business), frustration, discouragement
頓挫【トンザ】setback, deadlock, being at a standstill or impasse
kun reading compounds: 挫く【くじく】to sprain, to twist, to dampen (enthusiasm), to discourage, to dishearten, to dispirit, to depress, to unnerve, to crush
挫ける【くじける】to be disheartened, to lose heart, to be dispirited, to be crushed (emotionally), to be sprained, to be snapped, to be broken
